text:
Good morning!  I wanted to bring your attention to a new role we're hiring for here at HubSpot, <https://www.HubSpot.com/careers/jobs/2587599|Head of Asset Marketplace QA & Operations.>
The ideal candidate for this role is passionate about CMS developers, has a strong familiarity with website design best practices (HTML/CSS), and loves thinking both through short-term tactical work and long-term strategy.  Interested?  Apply today or DM me for more details.  :HubSpotheart:

Looking for a quote:

The job would be integrating Google Translate API on a HubSpot site for a client. I haven't worked with Google Translate since the old javascript based widget and I'm not an API guy.
They want to look into the option of using this rather than the built in HubSpot page translations.
